name: Rule the Universe (LaWosch)
description:
Rule the Universe

Made for the Major Jam 4: Cosmic

Limitation: "The player must cheat"

Concept:
You are tasked with keeping the order of the Universe intact. You have to drag and drop the planets, so they don't collide. You also have the power to stop time for a while but should NOT use it, because cheating on time itself can be dangerous.

Controls:
Mouse - Drag and Drop
Spacebar - Stop Timeflow
M - Back to Main Menu

Note:
When playing in browser, I recommend playing in fullscreen, otherwise the view is a bit weird.
